mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.geoobjecttype.TypeHasPrivateParents
mdException.label: Type Has Private Parents
mdException.message: The GeoObjectType [{typeLabel}] has private parents and thus cannot be set to public.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.geoobjecttype.PrivateTypeHasPublicChildren
mdException.label: Private Type Has Public Children
mdException.message: The GeoObjectType [{typeLabel}] has public children and cannot be set to private.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.geoobjecttype.PrivateTypeIsReferencedInPublicMasterLists
mdException.label: Private Type Is Referenced In Master List
mdException.message: The GeoObjectType [{typeLabel}] cannot be set to private because it is referenced in public master lists.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.geoobjecttype.AssignPublicChildOfPrivateType
mdException.label: Assign Public Child Of Private Type
mdException.message: You cannot add a public GeoObjectType as a child of a private GeoObjectType. All children of private GeoObjectTypes must also be private.
